components.name: OpenLiberty-System-Microservice-WAR-Container
components.description: This is the docker container for the WAR file application

edges.from: Show Current Routes and Services in Cluster (rlange)

edges.to: Show Current Routes and Services in Cluster (rlange)

offsets.name: Show Current Routes and Services in Cluster (rlange)

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
echo "I am user ${id}"
echo "My home directory is $HOME"
oc project rlange
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo ""
echo ""
echo "Routes in this namespace are:" 
oc get routes
echo ""
echo ""
echo "Services in this namespace are:"
oc get services

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

children.name: Display Pods to Ensure they are Cleaning Up

properties.scriptBody:
touch deploy-operator.yaml
echo "apiVersion: openliberty.io/v1beta1
kind: OpenLibertyApplication
metadata:
  name: openliberty-system-microservice
spec:
  applicationImage: quay.io/rslangehennig0/openliberty-system-microservice:${p:container-tag}
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 9080
  expose: true" >> deploy-operator.yaml
  
  cat deploy-operator.yaml

properties.scriptBody:
export timestamp=`date "+%s000"`
echo $timestamp

curl -k --location --request POST "${p:instana_url}/api/releases" \
  --header "Authorization: apiToken ${p:instana_apiToken}" \
  --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --data "{
	\"name\": \"${p:pipeline_name}\",
	\"start\": $timestamp
}"
